actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that the House may not consider the legislative branch appropriation bill until the House and the Senate have agreed to all other general appropriation bills for the fiscal year.

summary.text: Amends rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the House from considering the legislative branch appropriation bill for any fiscal year until the House and the Senate have agreed to all other general appropriation bills for such fiscal year.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that the House may not consider the legislative branch appropriation bill until the House and the Senate have agreed to all other general appropriation bills for the fiscal year.
